applications.description: The applications that are active during the date range requested.

id.description: The identifier for the household application that the individual is active on. Multiple individuals can be active on the same application id.

awards.description: The awards that were active for this application during the time period.

totalEntitlement.description: The sum of all the award entitlements for an award version. The net amount that will be received.

payProfCalcDate.description: The date the Payment Profile was calculated.

amount.description: Working Tax Credit element of the overall entitlement (totalEntitlement).

paidYTD.description: The actual payment amount, both direct and payment via employer (PVE). This is from the start of the tax credit period up to the calculated date of the payment profile.

babyAmount.description: Baby entitlement. This was no longer available after 2017.

paidYTD.description: The actual payment amount both direct and payment via employer (PVE) from the start of the tax credit period up to the calculated date of the payment profile.

payments.description: All payments made to the individual during the time period. If there were no payments to this individual, an empty array will be returned.

startDate.description: The start date of the payment.

endDate.description: The end date of the payment.

frequency.description: The number of days between payments. Currently supported values are 1, 7, 14, and 28.

tcType.description: The type of tax credit. Currently supported values are ETC and ICC.

amount.description: The amount to be paid to the recipient.
